query.value: InsightsMetrics | invoke pquery_gauge('kube_replicaset_spec_replicas') | extend replicaset = tostring(Labels.replicaset) | extend namespace = tostring(Labels.namespace) | join kind=inner ( InsightsMetrics | invoke pquery_gauge('kube_replicaset_status_ready_replicas') | extend replicaset = tostring(Labels.replicaset) | extend namespace = tostring(Labels.namespace) | extend ReadyReplicas=Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, SourceSystem, Type, _ResourceId, replicaset, namespace | where Val - ReadyReplicas > 0 | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, SourceSystem, Type, _ResourceId, Replicas=Val, ReadyReplicas, replicaset, namespace
